A fine woman."},{"lineNumber":254275,"originalJapaneseLine":"カオス、そっちかよー","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos, oh, that's what you noticed—really?"},{"lineNumber":254276,"originalJapaneseLine":"とにかく、いったん後方に下がって下さい、我々が援護しますとハウレーン","translatedEnglishLine":"Anyway, please fall back for now, we will provide support, said Howleen."},{"lineNumber":254277,"originalJapaneseLine":"陣地に戻って、夕方","translatedEnglishLine":"Return to the camp, evening."},{"lineNumber":254278,"originalJapaneseLine":"バレスなど軍会議、","translatedEnglishLine":"Baresu and others in a military conference."},{"lineNumber":254279,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィは強い。今回は引き分けだったが（負けたのだが・・）次は勝つとランス","translatedEnglishLine":"Silky is strong. This time it was a draw (well, actually we lost...), but Lance says we'll win next time."},{"lineNumber":254280,"originalJapaneseLine":"勝算はないが感だ、可愛い子相手に俺様が負ける訳はない。なんとかなる","translatedEnglishLine":"There's no real chance, just a feeling. There's no way I would lose to such a cute girl. It'll work out somehow."},{"lineNumber":254281,"originalJapaneseLine":"リーザス軍は負傷兵は多いが死者は少ない、特に魔人シルキィとあたった者はそう","translatedEnglishLine":"The Lizas army has many wounded but few dead, especially those who faced the demon Silky."},{"lineNumber":254282,"originalJapaneseLine":"もしかしてシルキィはわざと殺さないようにしているのでは無いのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Could it be that Silky is deliberately avoiding killing?"},{"lineNumber":254283,"originalJapaneseLine":"そんな事はないか、偶然だな","translatedEnglishLine":"Maybe not, maybe it’s just coincidence."},{"lineNumber":254284,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラがぽつんと居るので話かける","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera is standing alone, so I talk to her."},{"lineNumber":254285,"originalJapaneseLine":"シルキィの事","translatedEnglishLine":"About Silky."},{"lineNumber":254286,"originalJapaneseLine":"　サテラと同じホーネット派、共にケイブリスと戦っていた","translatedEnglishLine":"She and Satera are both from the Hornet faction, and fought together against Kabris."},{"lineNumber":254287,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでケイブリスの元で戦っているのか分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't understand why she fights under Kabris’s command."},{"lineNumber":254288,"originalJapaneseLine":"　（先のシーンでサテラがシルキィに言うシーンがあるのでその補足）","translatedEnglishLine":"(Supplement to the previous scene where Satera talks to Silky.)"},{"lineNumber":254289,"originalJapaneseLine":"　友達なの、おかしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Are they friends? That's strange."},{"lineNumber":254290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可愛い子だな・・もう少し詳しく聞かせてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"She's a cute girl... tell me more details about her."},{"lineNumber":254291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんな過去を持った子なんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of past does she have?"},{"lineNumber":254292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えっ、知らないの、人類の英雄だよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh? You don’t know? She’s a hero of humanity."},{"lineNumber":254293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クルックーが現れて補足","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukku appears and adds more information."},{"lineNumber":254294,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィの事は人類の裏切り者として歴史書から抹消されています","translatedEnglishLine":"Regarding Silky, she has been erased from history books as a traitor to humanity."},{"lineNumber":254295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほとんどの方は知りません。","translatedEnglishLine":"Most people do not know this."},{"lineNumber":254296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本来なら、ＭＭルーン、藤原石丸と並ぶ人類歴史上最強の英傑として","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, she should be celebrated as one of humanity’s greatest heroes, alongside MM Rune and Fujiwara Ishimaru."},{"lineNumber":254297,"originalJapaneseLine":"　称えられて当然な存在なのですが","translatedEnglishLine":"She should rightfully be honored as such."},{"lineNumber":254298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254299,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラかクルックーが話す形でシルキィの過去話となります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera or Krukku will narrate Silky’s past."},{"lineNumber":254300,"originalJapaneseLine":"以下の設定を元に適度に膨らませて入れて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Please expand appropriately based on the following setting."},{"lineNumber":254301,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間、平原","translatedEnglishLine":"Daytime, plains."},{"lineNumber":254302,"originalJapaneseLine":"第１軍と魔軍が対峙している、今日も戦いが始まる","translatedEnglishLine":"The 1st army and the demon army are facing off; She hasn’t appeared on the battlefield yet."},{"lineNumber":254312,"originalJapaneseLine":"なに、うむむ・・まさか、本当にあっちを狙うのか・・ぶつぶつ","translatedEnglishLine":"What? Hmmm... could it be she’s really aiming that way... muttering."},{"lineNumber":254313,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁいい、俺も出る。俺様が華麗に活躍したら現れるだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, I’ll go out too. Once I shine brilliantly, she'll probably show up."},{"lineNumber":254314,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時の美形の方・・わーいてな感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Like the handsome one at that time... all excited."},{"lineNumber":254315,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺を一目見て惚れたという可能性もあるからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s also a chance she fell for me at first sight."},{"lineNumber":254316,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the demon army headquarters."},{"lineNumber":254317,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍ヨシフは怒っていた、シルキィが動けないだと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"General Yoshifu was angry, hearing Silky was immobilized..."},{"lineNumber":254318,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨晩のプレイ（陵辱）が激しすぎて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Last night’s play (violation) was too intense..."},{"lineNumber":254319,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばかもんが何人でやったんだ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Fool, how many people were involved...?"},{"lineNumber":254320,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが・・１００人ほど・・魔人様なので死はしませんし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"About 100 people... but since she’s a demon, she didn’t die..."},{"lineNumber":254321,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、水でもぶっかけて戦わせろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, just throw water on her and make her fight."},{"lineNumber":254322,"originalJapaneseLine":"とひどい扱いをシルキィにしている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems Silky is being treated harshly."},{"lineNumber":254323,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、いつもシルキィに戦わせていて私の活躍の場が少なかったからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, Silky always fights, so I haven’t had many chances to shine."},{"lineNumber":254324,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日はひさしぶりに人間共を我々が駆逐してやろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Today, after a long time, let’s exterminate the humans ourselves."},{"lineNumber":254325,"originalJapaneseLine":"我々は、人間共の５倍の兵力がある、一気にたたみかけろ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have five times their numbers; press them all at once."},{"lineNumber":254326,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦場で戦うランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and others fight on the battlefield."},{"lineNumber":254327,"originalJapaneseLine":"何戦かした後、向こうに魔物将軍が居るようです","translatedEnglishLine":"After some battles, it seems there is a demon general over there."},{"lineNumber":254328,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理する必要ないしな、シルキィちゃんと戦う為に体力温存しないといけないし","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to force it; I need to conserve my energy to fight Silky-chan."},{"lineNumber":254329,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうするかな","translatedEnglishLine":"What should I do?"},{"lineNumber":254330,"originalJapaneseLine":"向かうかどうかの選択","translatedEnglishLine":"Choice: Whether to approach or not."},{"lineNumber":254331,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦う　ＨＰ消費","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight (Consumes HP)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、くそっ、まさか負けてしまうとは・・・だが　俺は見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, damn it, I never thought we'd lose... but I saw something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、おお、何か見切ったのか、奴の弱点でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, oh, did you see through something? Like his weakness?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、去り際に甲冑を外した時に素顔を見た、可愛いかった。いい女だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, when she removed her armor on the way out, I saw her bare face; she was cute. A fine woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、そっちかよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, oh, that's what you noticed—really?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、いったん後方に下がって下さい、我々が援護しますとハウレーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, please fall back for now, we will provide support, said Howleen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣地に戻って、夕方
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to the camp, evening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスなど軍会議、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu and others in a military conference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは強い。今回は引き分けだったが（負けたのだが・・）次は勝つとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is strong. This time it was a draw (well, actually we lost...), but Lance says we'll win next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝算はないが感だ、可愛い子相手に俺様が負ける訳はない。なんとかなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no real chance, just a feeling. There's no way I would lose to such a cute girl. It'll work out somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は負傷兵は多いが死者は少ない、特に魔人シルキィとあたった者はそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lizas army has many wounded but few dead, especially those who faced the demon Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしてシルキィはわざと殺さないようにしているのでは無いのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that Silky is deliberately avoiding killing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事はないか、偶然だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe not, maybe it’s just coincidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがぽつんと居るので話かける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is standing alone, so I talk to her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラと同じホーネット派、共にケイブリスと戦っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She and Satera are both from the Hornet faction, and fought together against Kabris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでケイブリスの元で戦っているのか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand why she fights under Kabris’s command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （先のシーンでサテラがシルキィに言うシーンがあるのでその補足）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Supplement to the previous scene where Satera talks to Silky.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友達なの、おかしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are they friends? That's strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い子だな・・もう少し詳しく聞かせてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a cute girl... tell me more details about her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな過去を持った子なんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of past does she have?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、知らないの、人類の英雄だよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? You don’t know? She’s a hero of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが現れて補足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku appears and adds more information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの事は人類の裏切り者として歴史書から抹消されています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding Silky, she has been erased from history books as a traitor to humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんどの方は知りません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most people do not know this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来なら、ＭＭルーン、藤原石丸と並ぶ人類歴史上最強の英傑として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, she should be celebrated as one of humanity’s greatest heroes, alongside MM Rune and Fujiwara Ishimaru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 称えられて当然な存在なのですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She should rightfully be honored as such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラかクルックーが話す形でシルキィの過去話となります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera or Krukku will narrate Silky’s past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以下の設定を元に適度に膨らませて入れて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please expand appropriately based on the following setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間、平原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daytime, plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１軍と魔軍が対峙している、今日も戦いが始まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 1st army and the demon army are facing off; the battle starts again today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この平原での戦いを突破されると一気にリーザス城まで侵攻される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they break through this battle on the plains, the invasion will quickly reach Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食い止めないといけない防衛ラインです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the defensive line that must be held.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝から戦いは続いていたが、ランスは現れていなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle had been ongoing since morning, but Lance had not appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼頃になってのうのうと現れたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around noon, Lance casually showed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスとはともかくハウレーンあたりはあまりいい気はしてない感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aside from Baresu, Howleen didn’t look too pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかもん、サボっていたのじゃないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You fool, I wasn’t slacking off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィちゃんを捕らえる為の罠を仕掛けておいたのだ、くっくっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I set traps to capture Silky-chan, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも２つもだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And two traps, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、シルキィちゃんはどこに居る、まだ戦場に出てきていません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is Silky-chan? She hasn’t appeared on the battlefield yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、うむむ・・まさか、本当にあっちを狙うのか・・ぶつぶつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Hmmm... could it be she’s really aiming that way... muttering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁいい、俺も出る。俺様が華麗に活躍したら現れるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I’ll go out too. Once I shine brilliantly, she'll probably show up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の美形の方・・わーいてな感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like the handsome one at that time... all excited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を一目見て惚れたという可能性もあるからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s also a chance she fell for me at first sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the demon army headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ヨシフは怒っていた、シルキィが動けないだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Yoshifu was angry, hearing Silky was immobilized...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨晩のプレイ（陵辱）が激しすぎて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last night’s play (violation) was too intense...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかもんが何人でやったんだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fool, how many people were involved...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが・・１００人ほど・・魔人様なので死はしませんし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 100 people... but since she’s a demon, she didn’t die...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、水でもぶっかけて戦わせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, just throw water on her and make her fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とひどい扱いをシルキィにしている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems Silky is being treated harshly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、いつもシルキィに戦わせていて私の活躍の場が少なかったからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Silky always fights, so I haven’t had many chances to shine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はひさしぶりに人間共を我々が駆逐してやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, after a long time, let’s exterminate the humans ourselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々は、人間共の５倍の兵力がある、一気にたたみかけろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have five times their numbers; press them all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で戦うランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and others fight on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何戦かした後、向こうに魔物将軍が居るようです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After some battles, it seems there is a demon general over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理する必要ないしな、シルキィちゃんと戦う為に体力温存しないといけないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to force it; I need to conserve my energy to fight Silky-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should I do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向かうかどうかの選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choice: Whether to approach or not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦う　ＨＰ消費
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight (Consumes HP)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

That's strange."},{"lineNumber":254290,"originalJapaneseLine":"　可愛い子だな・・もう少し詳しく聞かせてくれ","translatedEnglishLine":"She's a cute girl... tell me more details about her."},{"lineNumber":254291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どんな過去を持った子なんだ","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of past does she have?"},{"lineNumber":254292,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えっ、知らないの、人類の英雄だよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh? She’s a hero of humanity."},{"lineNumber":254293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　クルックーが現れて補足","translatedEnglishLine":"Krukku appears and adds more information."},{"lineNumber":254294,"originalJapaneseLine":"　シルキィの事は人類の裏切り者として歴史書から抹消されています","translatedEnglishLine":"Regarding Silky, she has been erased from history books as a traitor to humanity."},{"lineNumber":254295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ほとんどの方は知りません。","translatedEnglishLine":"Most people do not know this."},{"lineNumber":254296,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本来なら、ＭＭルーン、藤原石丸と並ぶ人類歴史上最強の英傑として","translatedEnglishLine":"Originally, she should be celebrated as one of humanity’s greatest heroes, alongside MM Rune and Fujiwara Ishimaru."},{"lineNumber":254297,"originalJapaneseLine":"　称えられて当然な存在なのですが","translatedEnglishLine":"She should rightfully be honored as such."},{"lineNumber":254298,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":254299,"originalJapaneseLine":"サテラかクルックーが話す形でシルキィの過去話となります。","translatedEnglishLine":"Satera or Krukku will narrate Silky’s past."},{"lineNumber":254300,"originalJapaneseLine":"以下の設定を元に適度に膨らませて入れて下さい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Please expand appropriately based on the following setting."},{"lineNumber":254301,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間、平原","translatedEnglishLine":"Daytime, plains."},{"lineNumber":254302,"originalJapaneseLine":"第１軍と魔軍が対峙している、今日も戦いが始まる","translatedEnglishLine":"The 1st army and the demon army are facing off; She hasn’t appeared on the battlefield yet."},{"lineNumber":254312,"originalJapaneseLine":"なに、うむむ・・まさか、本当にあっちを狙うのか・・ぶつぶつ","translatedEnglishLine":"What? Hmmm... could it be she’s really aiming that way... muttering."},{"lineNumber":254313,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁいい、俺も出る。俺様が華麗に活躍したら現れるだろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well then, I’ll go out too. Once I shine brilliantly, she'll probably show up."},{"lineNumber":254314,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの時の美形の方・・わーいてな感じで","translatedEnglishLine":"Like the handsome one at that time... all excited."},{"lineNumber":254315,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺を一目見て惚れたという可能性もあるからな。","translatedEnglishLine":"There’s also a chance she fell for me at first sight."},{"lineNumber":254316,"originalJapaneseLine":"その頃、魔軍司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the demon army headquarters."},{"lineNumber":254317,"originalJapaneseLine":"大将軍ヨシフは怒っていた、シルキィが動けないだと・・","translatedEnglishLine":"General Yoshifu was angry, hearing Silky was immobilized..."},{"lineNumber":254318,"originalJapaneseLine":"昨晩のプレイ（陵辱）が激しすぎて・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Last night’s play (violation) was too intense..."},{"lineNumber":254319,"originalJapaneseLine":"ばかもんが何人でやったんだ・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Fool, how many people were involved...?"},{"lineNumber":254320,"originalJapaneseLine":"それが・・１００人ほど・・魔人様なので死はしませんし・・","translatedEnglishLine":"About 100 people... but since she’s a demon, she didn’t die..."},{"lineNumber":254321,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、水でもぶっかけて戦わせろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, just throw water on her and make her fight."},{"lineNumber":254322,"originalJapaneseLine":"とひどい扱いをシルキィにしている様子","translatedEnglishLine":"It seems Silky is being treated harshly."},{"lineNumber":254323,"originalJapaneseLine":"まぁ、いつもシルキィに戦わせていて私の活躍の場が少なかったからな","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, Silky always fights, so I haven’t had many chances to shine."},{"lineNumber":254324,"originalJapaneseLine":"今日はひさしぶりに人間共を我々が駆逐してやろう","translatedEnglishLine":"Today, after a long time, let’s exterminate the humans ourselves."},{"lineNumber":254325,"originalJapaneseLine":"我々は、人間共の５倍の兵力がある、一気にたたみかけろ","translatedEnglishLine":"We have five times their numbers; I need to conserve my energy to fight Silky-chan."},{"lineNumber":254329,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうするかな","translatedEnglishLine":"What should I do?"},{"lineNumber":254330,"originalJapaneseLine":"向かうかどうかの選択","translatedEnglishLine":"Choice: Whether to approach or not."},{"lineNumber":254331,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦う　ＨＰ消費","translatedEnglishLine":"> Fight (Consumes HP)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、くそっ、まさか負けてしまうとは・・・だが　俺は見た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, damn it, I never thought we'd lose... but I saw something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、おお、何か見切ったのか、奴の弱点でも
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, oh, did you see through something? Like his weakness?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、去り際に甲冑を外した時に素顔を見た、可愛いかった。いい女だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance, when she removed her armor on the way out, I saw her bare face; she was cute. A fine woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: カオス、そっちかよー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos, oh, that's what you noticed—really?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とにかく、いったん後方に下がって下さい、我々が援護しますとハウレーン
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, please fall back for now, we will provide support, said Howleen.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 陣地に戻って、夕方
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Return to the camp, evening.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスなど軍会議、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Baresu and others in a military conference.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィは強い。今回は引き分けだったが（負けたのだが・・）次は勝つとランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Silky is strong. This time it was a draw (well, actually we lost...), but Lance says we'll win next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 勝算はないが感だ、可愛い子相手に俺様が負ける訳はない。なんとかなる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no real chance, just a feeling. There's no way I would lose to such a cute girl. It'll work out somehow.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス軍は負傷兵は多いが死者は少ない、特に魔人シルキィとあたった者はそう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Lizas army has many wounded but few dead, especially those who faced the demon Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしかしてシルキィはわざと殺さないようにしているのでは無いのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Could it be that Silky is deliberately avoiding killing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな事はないか、偶然だな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe not, maybe it’s just coincidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラがぽつんと居るので話かける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera is standing alone, so I talk to her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About Silky.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラと同じホーネット派、共にケイブリスと戦っていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She and Satera are both from the Hornet faction, and fought together against Kabris.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでケイブリスの元で戦っているのか分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't understand why she fights under Kabris’s command.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （先のシーンでサテラがシルキィに言うシーンがあるのでその補足）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Supplement to the previous scene where Satera talks to Silky.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 友達なの、おかしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are they friends? That's strange.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可愛い子だな・・もう少し詳しく聞かせてくれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She's a cute girl... tell me more details about her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どんな過去を持った子なんだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of past does she have?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、知らないの、人類の英雄だよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh? You don’t know? She’s a hero of humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: クルックーが現れて補足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Krukku appears and adds more information.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィの事は人類の裏切り者として歴史書から抹消されています
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Regarding Silky, she has been erased from history books as a traitor to humanity.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほとんどの方は知りません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Most people do not know this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本来なら、ＭＭルーン、藤原石丸と並ぶ人類歴史上最強の英傑として
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Originally, she should be celebrated as one of humanity’s greatest heroes, alongside MM Rune and Fujiwara Ishimaru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 称えられて当然な存在なのですが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She should rightfully be honored as such.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラかクルックーが話す形でシルキィの過去話となります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Satera or Krukku will narrate Silky’s past.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 以下の設定を元に適度に膨らませて入れて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please expand appropriately based on the following setting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間、平原
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Daytime, plains.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 第１軍と魔軍が対峙している、今日も戦いが始まる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 1st army and the demon army are facing off; the battle starts again today.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この平原での戦いを突破されると一気にリーザス城まで侵攻される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If they break through this battle on the plains, the invasion will quickly reach Lizas Castle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 食い止めないといけない防衛ラインです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This is the defensive line that must be held.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 朝から戦いは続いていたが、ランスは現れていなかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The battle had been ongoing since morning, but Lance had not appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼頃になってのうのうと現れたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around noon, Lance casually showed up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バレスとはともかくハウレーンあたりはあまりいい気はしてない感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Aside from Baresu, Howleen didn’t look too pleased.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかもん、サボっていたのじゃないぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You fool, I wasn’t slacking off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シルキィちゃんを捕らえる為の罠を仕掛けておいたのだ、くっくっ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I set traps to capture Silky-chan, hehe.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それも２つもだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And two traps, too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: で、シルキィちゃんはどこに居る、まだ戦場に出てきていません。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, where is Silky-chan? She hasn’t appeared on the battlefield yet.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なに、うむむ・・まさか、本当にあっちを狙うのか・・ぶつぶつ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What? Hmmm... could it be she’s really aiming that way... muttering.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁいい、俺も出る。俺様が華麗に活躍したら現れるだろう。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well then, I’ll go out too. Once I shine brilliantly, she'll probably show up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの時の美形の方・・わーいてな感じで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like the handsome one at that time... all excited.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺を一目見て惚れたという可能性もあるからな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There’s also a chance she fell for me at first sight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、魔軍司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the demon army headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 大将軍ヨシフは怒っていた、シルキィが動けないだと・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: General Yoshifu was angry, hearing Silky was immobilized...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨晩のプレイ（陵辱）が激しすぎて・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Last night’s play (violation) was too intense...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ばかもんが何人でやったんだ・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fool, how many people were involved...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それが・・１００人ほど・・魔人様なので死はしませんし・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: About 100 people... but since she’s a demon, she didn’t die...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、水でもぶっかけて戦わせろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, just throw water on her and make her fight.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とひどい扱いをシルキィにしている様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seems Silky is being treated harshly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まぁ、いつもシルキィに戦わせていて私の活躍の場が少なかったからな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, Silky always fights, so I haven’t had many chances to shine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今日はひさしぶりに人間共を我々が駆逐してやろう
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today, after a long time, let’s exterminate the humans ourselves.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 我々は、人間共の５倍の兵力がある、一気にたたみかけろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We have five times their numbers; press them all at once.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦場で戦うランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and others fight on the battlefield.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何戦かした後、向こうに魔物将軍が居るようです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After some battles, it seems there is a demon general over there.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理する必要ないしな、シルキィちゃんと戦う為に体力温存しないといけないし
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to force it; I need to conserve my energy to fight Silky-chan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうするかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What should I do?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 向かうかどうかの選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Choice: Whether to approach or not.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦う　ＨＰ消費
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Fight (Consumes HP)
